metadata.Title: CVE-2022-23517 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: rails-html-sanitizer is responsible for sanitizing HTML fragments in Rails applications. Certain configurations of rails-html-sanitizer < 1.4.4 use an inefficient regular expression that is susceptible to excessive backtracking when attempting to sanitize certain SVG attributes. This may lead to a denial of service through CPU resource consumption. This issue has been patched in version 1.4.4.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-html-sanitizer package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
